snippet.title: Aschermann Russia Victory Day
snippet.description: * Aschermann Russia Victory Day (clueweb12-0818wb-25-12880) http://academic.missouriwestern.edu/ascher/russia/victory.htm ...that is part of Red Square. It is estimated that over 1 million people visited Lenin after his death in 1920. By 1929 a permanent mausoleum had been built. In the Soviet Union Lenin rose to a higher level then Jesus Christ. Hero worship of Lenin became the order of the day. May 2004. The Lenin Mausoleum is open to the public. Strict security is used to enforce the order of "no photographs allowed... [cached version]

The Lenin Mausoleum next to the Kremlin reopened for visitors today, after the regular restoration work on Lenin's mummy had been completed. Meanwhile there is still a dispute over the future of the mausoleum. Since 1924, the embalmed body of the leader of the Socialist... [cached version]
